featured.text: She was born in Philadelphia and sang in church choirs during her childhood.
He was bothered by a small irritation every Sunday as he sang in the church choir.

definition.zh_def: 合唱團，一群人一起唱歌的組織或團體。
definition.en_def: A choir is a group of people who sing together, often in a structured manner.
definition.example: She sings in the school choir every Wednesday.
